mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectGodGodEvlAtchFile Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ GOD_NO , GOD_EVL_TURN , ATCH_FILE_TURN , ATCH_FILE_NM , ATCH_FILE_URL , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM GOD_GOD_EVL_ATCH_FILE WHERE 1 = 1 AND GOD_NO = #{godNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND GOD_EVL_TURN = #{godEvlTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND ATCH_FILE_TURN = #{atchFileTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
